item.title: Proton VPN reveals Black Friday sales are directly paying for server expansion
item.description: Ever wonder where your VPN subscription money goes? Proton has just confirmed its early Black Friday sales are already being funneled into expanding its server infrastructure for all users.

item.title: Google’s AI Mode can now help you visualize your travel plans

The document it puts together can lay out potential plans, with suggestions based on the user’s […]

item.title: Netgear’s $499.99 5G hotspot lets you swap eSIMs at will
item.description: Netgear announced its latest mobile hotspot today, the Nighthawk 5G M7, which will be available in January, along with a new mobile app and an eSIM marketplace where you can purchase local SIM cards for more than 140 countries. The M7 comes unlocked for $499.99, making it a more affordable alternative to the unlocked version […]

item.title: Les nuages d’Amazon, de Microsoft et de Google sur la sellette européenne
item.description: Les opérateurs de cloud — Microsoft, Alphabet et Amazon — sont sous la loupe du régulateur européen. Bruxelles chercherait à déterminer si les mastodontes américains des services d'hébergement et de stockage en ligne peuvent tomber dans l'escarcelle du DMA.

item.description: The Legend of Zelda Movie's first-look images have been revealed, but I'm more interested by what that video leak shows us.

item.title: Here’s how YouTube became the most-watched video provider in the U.S.
item.description: In its early days, the odds seemed good that YouTube was destined for failure. After a false start as a dating website, it wasn’t clear whether the company could cover the cost of streaming video content, or avoid the fate of Napster, which was sued out of business for copyright infringement. But after getting acquired […] In its early days, the odds seemed good that YouTube was destined for failure. item.title: Even the lawmakers behind the TikTok ban have no idea what’s going on
item.description: Less than two years ago, TikTok was a crisis situation on Capitol Hill. The chair of the House Select Committee on China called it "digital fentanyl" that brainwashes young Americans into supporting Hamas. A former national security adviser said letting TikTok remain in the US under its Chinese owner "would be akin to allowing Soviet […]

item.title: Jeff Bezos to co-lead AI startup Project Prometheus, raising $6.2 billion
item.description: It will be his first operational role since Amazon. Jeff Bezos will serve as co-chief executive officer of a new artificial intelligence startup that focuses on AI for engineering and manufacturing of computers, automobiles, and spacecraft, the New York Times reported on Monday.

item.title: Pourquoi il vaut mieux utiliser le DisplayPort que le HDMI sur votre PC
item.description: Ces deux câbles se ressemblent, mais ils n'ont rien à voir. Le HDMI domine le grand public, mais sur PC, c'est le DisplayPort qui écrase tout : 80 Go/s de bande passante pour le DP 2.1 contre 48 Go/s pour le HDMI 2.1. Résultat ? Plus de Hz, de meilleurs couleurs, du HDR sans compromis. Et pourtant, la plupart d'entre vous utilisent encore du HDMI. ...

item.title: Meet the 2026 Rhodes scholars tackling the world’s biggest problems
item.description: The new cohort includes students focused on housing, health outcomes, sustainability, and prison reentry programs. Five students at U.S. military academies and three each from Yale University, Harvard University, and the Massachusetts Institute of Technology are among the 32 American winners named Sunday as 2026 Rhodes scholars.

Objectif : grappiller en performances, enrichir la configuration des cœurs et offrir un support mémoire plus rapide, le tout dans la dernière vague du socket LGA 1851 avant l’arrivée de Nova Lake. ...
